tweet: 🚨BREAKING🚨: I just spoke with the team at Tendercare Living Centre in Scarborough. >145 of 188 residents are #COVID19 positive. 26 have died!  The government needs to respond to the needs of #LTC homes in outbreak ASAP.  This is a humanitarian crisis, we need action now!
